game.title: Sonic the Hedgehog
game.synopsis: In this fast-paced platformer, Sonic must defeat Dr. Eggman to save the world from his evil plans. He uses his speed and abilities to navigate through various levels.
game.beginning: The game starts with Sonic receiving a distress signal from Peach's castle, where he quickly rushes to help.
game.ending: With the help of his friends Tails and Knuckles, Sonic defeats Dr. Eggman and rescues Peach, securing peace in Mobius.
